scripts.build:docs: ./node_modules/.bin/compodoc -p src/tsconfig.lib.json -n "Senzing SDK Components" --includesName "Guides" -d docs -a src/docs/images --includes src/docs --disableInternal --disablePrivate --disableDomTree --disableGraph --disableRoutesGraph --disableCoverage --disableSourceCode && node build-docs
scripts.deprecated:build:schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p ./src/tsconfig.schematics.json && npm run copy:schematics:files && npm run copy:schematics:collection
scripts.watch: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:data-table: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/data-table" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:charts: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/charts --configuration=development --watch" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:graph: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/graph --configuration=development --watch" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:search-with-prefs: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/search-with-prefs --configuration=development" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:search-with-results-and-details: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/search-with-results-and-details" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:search-in-graph: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/search-in-graph --configuration=debug" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:search-by-id: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/search-by-id" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:with-why-features: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/with-why-features" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
scripts.watch:with-how-features: rm -fR dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng && concurrently --kill-others "wait-on file:dist/@senzing/sdk-components-ng/public-api.d.ts && ng serve @senzing/sdk-components-ng/examples/with-how-features" "ng build @senzing/sdk-components-ng --watch"
